description: Detects potentially suspicious SQL queries using SQLCmd targeting the Veeam backup databases in order to steal information.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: Veeam Backup Database Suspicious Query
query: (process.executable.text:"*\\sqlcmd.exe" AND process.command_line.text:"*VeeamBackup*" AND process.command_line.text:"*From\ *" AND process.command_line.text:("*BackupRepositories*" OR "*Backups*" OR "*Credentials*" OR "*HostCreds*" OR "*SmbFileShares*" OR "*Ssh_creds*" OR "*VSphereInfo*"))
